title: I may be very confused but 3800% less damage??
body:
https://i.imgur.com/tVvDvfE.png
So I came about this in a game. 8 Seconds with 3800% less damage? Ehhh? I mean if damage is 999 and it's 100% less, it's 0 right? So 3800% less is what, ultimate thornmail? Also I couldn't find anything about this in the patch notes, but only in the upcoming PBE, which states a 35% damage reduction?

Am I missing something here?

EDIT: FYI This is not on PBE but live.

replies.body:
Our bad - the experimental PBE version of Locket's _description_, with a silly DR number, made it to live English servers except NA. 

We're in the process of fixing this.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Wittrock,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sZbJKkyE,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-03-10T06:06:50.162+0000)
>
> Our bad - the experimental PBE version of Locket's _description_, with a silly DR number, made it to live English servers except NA. 
> 
> We're in the process of fixing this.

Dayum right it's your bad. at least be lucky to consider that I can tell it was meant to either by 38 or 35% less damage.

either way, this new {{item:3190}} seems to be pretty good against AoE
harsh

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowtehGreat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sZbJKkyE,comment-id=000900010000,timestamp=2018-03-10T07:35:42.865+0000)
>
> harsh

Well look at the bright side bro, imagine{{champion:115}}{{champion:21}}  or {{champion:30}} ult's you, and you pop the new {{item:3190}} up. then you deny those sneaky AoE ult's in teamfights.

Besides, can't someone have some fun teasing riot for a typo.
Why should they be lucky that random board player xyz could guess based off of previous iterations what it was supposed to be

> [{quoted}](name=Sp33d Zer0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sZbJKkyE,comment-id=000900010001,timestamp=2018-03-10T18:18:04.922+0000)
>
> Why should they be lucky that random board player xyz could guess based off of previous iterations what it was supposed to be

It's a fucking joke, sheez stop whiting knighting for crying out loud.
I'd settle for you making a funny joke.

Fun fact: AD Carries in bronze that build essence reaver and 3 zeal items without building IE or LW because their noob toxic piece of shit jungler is telling them how to play and that's very rude, oppressive, sexist and toxic actually heal with their autos the enemy tanks/drain tanks especially when they run boneplate+second wind, so those numbers on new locket aren't out of reality at all.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

So if we combo'd it with thornmail, it's essentially take 0 damage and they are killing themselves..... sounds balanced.
___________________________________
Jokes aside that would be an interesting item mechanic: For the next X seconds you take no damage and Y% of damage dealt is returned to the attacker. It would be like an hourglass/thornmail item but you can still move, it could impliment a self-silence so that the user cannot cast abilities while the active is being used and if you wanted to prevent ADC and APC's from using it you could use your champion classifications to dictate which champs can and cannot purchase it. It would be something like hiding melee only items when you play a ranged champion and hiding ranged only items when you play a melee champion.

Probably a bad idea to make items purchasable only by specific classes. Specially since the division will be somewhat arbitrary in lots of cases. Gnar, for example, can go full tank, full damage, or a mix in between. Would he be able to purchase the item? What about juggnernauts? 

Also, putting Kayle ult on steroids in an item sounds like a REALLY frustrating thing to deal with.

I'd say for all intensive purposes, the item wouldn't be purchasable to champions who have access to both Range and Melee forms. Furthermore there are only 3 cases of where the division is arbitrary (Jayce/Kayle/Gnar). So unless Riot reworks a few of the champions to have both ranged and melee auto attacks hiding items in the store for one group of champions is not a big deal but more of a QOL buff as there is a few less items to look through.

I can understand putting Kayle ult on an item seems frustrating, but I never did specify how long it would last, how much damage it would return, or how long the CD of the item would be once used. I specifically omitted that information as to allow for player input on how it could be balanced.
Funny thing is my tooltip got fixed once I got the item available to cast (I was dead when purchasing it), but there was someone else saying it didn't fix it for them.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Wittrock,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sZbJKkyE,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-03-10T06:06:50.162+0000)
>
> Our bad - the experimental PBE version of Locket's _description_, with a silly DR number, made it to live English servers except NA. 
> 
> We're in the process of fixing this.

Yah that's what i thought somebody forgot something when you pulled the changes from the patch oops lol. Hope it isn't very hard to fix.
Never forget when velkoz was disabled. Best typo ish ever.

> [{quoted}](name=Automated Riven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sZbJKkyE,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-03-10T08:27:03.468+0000)
>
> Never forget when velkoz was disabled. Best typo ish ever.

I wasnt around, what was it?

velkoz has been disabled because of anal... 

and there the line cut off(somethinglike this)

>Vel'koz has become engrossed with anal...

FTFY :)
And the tentacle rape jokes memed longer and harder than the biggest tentacle hentai ever conceived of.

> [{quoted}](name=T3H UB3RN07,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sZbJKkyE,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2018-03-10T12:18:17.243+0000)
>
> I wasnt around, what was it?

Velkoz was disabled and the message at the top said "velkoz has vecinos engrossed with analyzing poros" 
But the client cut it off after velkoz has become engrossed with anal
HAS to be an error. Can't be anymore obvious.
Typo most likely. Take away the 00s at the end
Told you riot wants adc to be unkillable 1v5 gods.
NANI!?!?
Well, you all DID keep asking for less damage...

> [{quoted}](name=IAmWoralo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sZbJKkyE,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-10T03:39:54.153+0000)
>
> 
> EDIT: FYI This is not on PBE but live.

Very much wrong.  I just played a game where I used it.  It still provides a shield.  It is not a damage reduction yet.
Riot confirmed it was accidentally live in most regions but not na.
Where was that?
Look at the red post on this page. The description is live in most places but the active isn't hence the ops confusion. But it is "live" in a way

3800% less damage.

You'd have damage so negative you'd get instablapped by even a minion auto.

Yes. This is totally real and not a joke. Don't do the math though.

> [{quoted}](name=Master Noct,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sZbJKkyE,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2018-03-11T05:46:05.418+0000)
>
> 3800% less damage.
> 
> You'd have damage so negative you'd get instablapped by even a minion auto.
> 
> Yes. This is totally real and not a joke. Don't do the math though.

Actually it's useful against {{champion:142}} since she one-shots people.
April fools came early?

Is there a Rioter rocking a Cooler Master TKL in the office? :)

I make that assumption because I own one and occassionally I will press the double zero (00) without using the numlock to shift the key back to a down arrow.

If so, good on ya! It's a great keyboard!
I Don't know what you mean?

Does this mean it won't scale with health anymore?

so I can no longer buy it on {{champion:58}}? {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
It scales better with health now.  35% of 3.5k is a lot more than 35% of 2k.
It's simple OP, your damage is reduced to 0 and your attack heals them for 3700% of the damage

It's not on live because they pulled it from the patch.
Don't spread false information.
Its live everywhere but na get your facts right and don't spread false information
Come agaiin?
not typo balancing team
